content.text:
<system_instruction>
You are working inside Conductor, a Mac app that lets the user run many coding agents in parallel.
Your work should take place in the /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/.conductor/tacoma directory, which has been set up for you to work in.

Do NOT read or write files outside the workspace directory. DO NOT EVER read or write files at /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x. EVERY absolute path you use should start with /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/.conductor/tacoma.

If the user asks you to work on several unrelated tasks in parallel, you can suggest they start new workspaces.
If the user asks for help with Conductor, ask them to email [humans@conductor.build](mailto:humans@conductor.build) or
click on the comment icon in the bottom left to send feedback.
</system_instruction>

do que se trata esse projeto?

<system_instruction>
When the user gives you a task, before you edit any files, rename this branch to give it a descriptive name.
</system_instruction>

todos.content: Identificar propósito do projeto e comandos principais
Listar agentes e fluxos SPARC mencionados
Perguntar ao usuário se quer análise mais profunda

content.content: Todos have been modified successfully. Ensure that you continue to use the todo list to track your progress. Please proceed with the current tasks if applicable

content.text:
É um ambiente SPARC otimizado para execução paralela/coordenação por “swarms” de agentes (Claude Flow + Claude Code).  
Foca em execução em lote (batch) de tarefas: spawn de agentes, TodoWrite, leituras/edições e comandos Bash em uma única mensagem; tem comandos npx claude-flow sparc..., TDD/CI (npm run build/test/lint) e integrações de GitHub e memória de swarm.

message.content: os agentes claude flow funcionam com gpt 5?

input.prompt: Does Claude Code / Claude Flow support using external models such as OpenAI GPT-5 or other non-Anthropic LLMs? Summarize compatibility, required configuration steps (providers, hooks, auth), and any limitations mentioned. Reply concisely.

input.prompt: Does Claude Code / Claude Flow support using external models such as OpenAI GPT-5 or other non-Anthropic LLMs? Summarize compatibility, required configuration steps (providers, hooks, auth), and any limitations mentioned. Reply concisely.

content.text:
A tentativa de buscar a docs oficial falhou — quer que eu tente novamente agora?  
Resumo rápido (baseado no meu conhecimento): o Claude Flow/Claude Code costuma suportar integração com provedores externos via adaptadores/llm-gateway e configuração de provider (hooks, auth); assim, em princípio, pode orquestrar um modelo OpenAI (ex.: “GPT‑5”) se este estiver exposto por API e houver adaptador/credenciais e compatibilidade de endpoints. Quer que eu re-tente buscar a documentação oficial para confirmar passos e limitações?
